sec.p: M. peltata requires rainfall levels of above 2400 mm and it will tolerate rainfall levels of up to 3200 mm per year (Paynter et al. 2006). Thus, the lower moisture threshold (SM0) was set at 0.35, the lower (SM1) and upper (SM2) optimal soil moisture were set at 0.6 and 1.3, respectively, and the limiting soil moisture (SM3) was set at 2.
